definitions.definition: Any of several plants of the genus Lens , especially Lens culinaris , from southwest Asia , that have edible, lens-shaped seeds within flattened pods .
The seed of these plants, used as food.

main_definition: Any of several plants of the genus Lens , especially Lens culinaris , from southwest Asia , that have edible, lens-shaped seeds within flattened pods .
secondary_definitions: The seed of these plants, used as food.
